did.unittitle: Early Draft fragments, p.47-552 [scattered] and unnumbered pages, typescript and photocopies of typescript.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: These fragments are from different versions. When fragment pages that belong to early drafts of The Weedkiller's Daughter were found with other manuscripts or with correspondence, these pages were photocopied for inclusion here. Page 111, 114 correspond to p. 189, 193 (chapter 9); p. 144 corresponds to p.258-9 (chapter 12); p. 188 corresponds to p. 176 (chapter 9); p. 281-2 corresponds to p. 251-2 (chapter 12). There was insufficient time to determine other correspondences.
